title: Update Failed unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information Patch 7.6
body:
When launch go to 75% i het out this eror.( update failed unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information )
Someone know what i can do ?

replies.body: My problem is a little different I was in champion Select for a ranked game and it just said the update has failed then it said unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information. But there was no update i have been playing all day then it just stopped working. I've tried to uninstall and reinstall many times but it is not working any ideas?

> [{quoted}](name=The1uFear,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GrLboAew,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-08-12T16:44:21.331+0000)
>
> My problem is a little different I was in champion Select for a ranked game and it just said the update has failed then it said unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information. But there was no update i have been playing all day then it just stopped working. I've tried to uninstall and reinstall many times but it is not working any ideas?

Same thing happened to me today
Me too. I'm pissed about it. I tried reinstalling league all together and still i just get error after error.
Same thing just happened to me and my boyfriend. Reinstalling it doesnt work.
Same thing happened to me today on NA server.
SAME ON NA WTF CANT EVEN REINSTALL

Not exactly the same, was logged in and was supposed to play with a friend today, but it told me to restart. I reopened it and it just gave the same error after every retry. So, I uninstalled thinking it was just a bug on my end/PC and it won't allow a reinstall either, just gives the same error.

Similar issue here. Went to log in for the first time today, patch download was stuck at 33% for over ten minutes. tried to repatch via hextech repair tool, didnt work.  tried to switch regions, didnt work. Tried to uninstall game and redownload, got an error stating " update failed: unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information.  Deleting folders doesnt help, changing firewall settings doesnt work, etc.

If you get an unspecified error whenever you're patching, there's a good chance your connection to our patching servers somehow became unstable enough to interrupt the patching process. 

Check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to patch up your network's connection so that you can get that patch downloaded.

> [{quoted}](name=Shaolin Kosa,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GrLboAew,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-26T15:18:55.729+0000)
>
> When launch go to 75% i het out this eror.( update failed unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information )
> Someone know what i can do ?

same here, i tryed to reinstall league of legends but the problem still there, i tryed all the methods that i saw and nothing works.
Same. I load up the patcher and sometimes it doesn't even tell me how much I need to download. I have been trying to fix it for 3-4 days now and I can't find anything to make it work.

I cant reinstall  when its 40-50 it just popps up unspecified error occurred please check logs for more information i dont know what to do i have downloaded hextech repair tool but its still now working can someone help
try to delete AVG. it can help u.
same here already find a solution noting worked
right like this is so annoying. Lmao I spent so much money on this game just for it not to work.
